trans-unit.source: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento localizado pela infraestrutura "Pessoas quase-Me".

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class cannot be created directly.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar diretamente uma instância desta classe.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A> method to return a collection of nearby peers.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, uma referência para os elementos de rede "quase" o elemento de rede de chamada é obtida utilizando a estática <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A>método para devolver uma coleção de elementos que.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A>

trans-unit.source: A peer represented by a PeerNearMe object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento um representado por um objeto de PeerNearMe não é necessariamente no livro de endereços a chamada do elemento de rede.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância predefinida do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância com os parâmetros associados necessários para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O destino de serialização associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and associates it with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto e associa-a com a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>objeto associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create and associate a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de colaboração falhou ao criar e associar um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> com o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the associated descriptive parameters from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and associates it with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> com os parâmetros associados descritivos do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto e associa-a com a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The display name assigned to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: O nome a apresentar atribuído para o contacto recentemente criado.

trans-unit.source: The `nickname` to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: O `nickname` para atribuir ao contacto recentemente criado.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> object that specifies the email address to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref>objeto que especifica o endereço de e-mail para atribuir ao contacto recentemente criado.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> containing descriptive parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>objeto associado a um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> contendo parâmetros descritivos.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create or update a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de colaboração falhou ao criar ou atualizar um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> com o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object from the provided <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto a partir do fornecido <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the provided <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> does not map to a signed-in peer on the same subnet, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se fornecido <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>não é mapeado para um elemento de início de sessão iniciada na mesma sub-rede, `null` é devolvido.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object that specifies the endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>objeto que especifica o ponto final associado o elemento de rede.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>objeto associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The peerEndPoint is .
trans-unit.target: The peerEndPoint is .

trans-unit.source: The referenced <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*> specifies <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento referenciado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*>Especifica <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto e, opcionalmente, liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância de teste de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância fornecida tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The other argument is .
trans-unit.target: The other argument is .

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de teste de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância fornecida tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instâncias são consideradas iguais.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instâncias fornecidas tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Um 32 bits com sinal código hash de número inteiro utilizado para comparar as instâncias deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo derivado tem de chamar o tipo base <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de rede para obter os dados de aplicação, o objeto e presença específicos para um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dados obtidos são armazenados na cache de acedidos pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>métodos, bem como o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InternalRefreshData method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: O método InternalRefreshData só tem de ser utilizado se o autor da chamada não está subscrito a especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Este método bloqueia chamadas adicionais até que a operação de rede foi concluída e a cache foi atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: O autor da chamada não é necessário para iniciar sessão com a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>método ou através de uma interface de utilizador em para concluir esta operação com êxito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application, object, and presence data relevant to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os dados de aplicação, o objeto e presença relevantes para um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Envia um convite para associar uma aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto para um elemento da rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the relevant <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"></xref> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref>o objeto que contém o relevante <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"> </xref> valor especificado pelo elemento da rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> specified by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> especificada pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou tem uma contagem de valor dos pontos finais associados '0'.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Guid> has not been associated with the current peer-to-peer application.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Guid>não foi associado à aplicação ponto-a-ponto atual.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer that includes data that describes or specifies the application invite.
trans-unit.target: Envia um convite para associar uma aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto para um elemento de rede remota que inclui dados descrevem ou Especifica o convite a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application represented by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto relevante representada por um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem a enviar para o elemento de rede remoto, juntamente com o convite de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem pode ser mais do que 255 carateres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador definido blob de dados para associar o convite.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K (16,384 bytes).
trans-unit.target: Tamanho está limitado a 16K (16.384 bytes).

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the relevant <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"></xref> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref>o objeto que contém o relevante <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"> </xref> valor especificado pelo elemento da rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: The applicationToInvite argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: O applicationToInvite argumento especifica .

trans-unit.source: - The applicationToInvite argument specifies an empty .
trans-unit.target: -O applicationToInvite argumento especifica . vazio

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> specified by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> especificada pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou tem uma contagem de valor dos pontos finais associados '0'.

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding joining a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma resposta de convite de um elemento relativos à associação a uma aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Foi transmitido um objeto definido pelo utilizador para a chamada de retorno da operação assíncrona para fins de identificação.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro necessário tem de ser exclusivo em todas as operações assíncronas convite ainda em curso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: The userToken argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: O userToken argumento especifica .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object does not specify a valid <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> o objecto não especifica um <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid> válido

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding an invitation to a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma resposta de convite de um elemento de um convite para uma aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application information represented by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as informações de aplicação de colaboração ponto a ponto relevantes representadas por um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem a enviar para o elemento de rede remoto, juntamente com o convite de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem pode ser mais do que 255 carateres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador definido blob de dados para associar o convite.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho é limitado a 16K.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Foi transmitido um objeto definido pelo utilizador para a chamada de retorno da operação assíncrona para fins de identificação.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro necessário tem de ser exclusivo em todas as operações assíncronas convite ainda em curso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: The applicationToInvite argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: O applicationToInvite argumento especifica .

trans-unit.source: The userToken argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: O userToken argumento especifica .

trans-unit.source: - The endpoint specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> was not found.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> representing the Nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.String>que representa a alcunha do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If a contact is generated from a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> object, the associated contact Nickname is populated with this property value.
trans-unit.target: Se for gerado um contacto de um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>objeto, o contacto associado alcunha é preenchida com este valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents the Nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>que representa a alcunha do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Sinais de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: As classes que herdam desta classe podem substituir este método para efetuar adicionais as tarefas quando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Este método também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Event data contained in a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dados de evento contidos num <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance is found, no longer available, or the associated <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Assinalou quando um novo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância for localizada, já não está disponível, ou associada <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> informações de objeto foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de rede para obter os dados de aplicação, o objeto e presença específicos para um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dados obtidos são armazenados na cache de acedidos pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>métodos, bem como o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Este método só tem de ser utilizado se o autor da chamada não está subscrito a especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Este método bloqueia chamadas adicionais até que a operação de rede foi concluída e a cache foi atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: O autor da chamada não é necessário para iniciar sessão com a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>método ou através de uma interface de utilizador em para concluir esta operação com êxito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de rede para obter os dados de aplicação, o objeto e presença específicos para um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dados obtidos são armazenados na cache de acedidos pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>métodos, bem como o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A>método só tem de ser utilizado se o autor da chamada não está subscrito a especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Este método bloqueia chamadas adicionais até que a operação de rede foi concluída e a cache foi atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
